project.description: Do a "normal" build from SVN. Do more testing than the matrix builds.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
export JAVA_HOME=/usr cd trunk
echo huddir $hudsondir
#$HUDSON_HOME/bin/verifyBuildJars2 ./d.sh -verbose builder ./d.sh clean ./d.sh ./d.sh copyphoneme ./d.sh -verbose -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata cldc imp debugger
ls -l > sizereport.txt
./d.sh map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite ./d.sh genspec ./d.sh jvmenv ./d.sh systemproperties ./d.sh Mnemonics ./d.sh OPC ./d.sh OperandStackEffect ./d.sh Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version
$hudsondir/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING ls $hudsondir/bin/ rm -rf tempdoc
echo MAKEAPI DISABLED FOR NOW! #java -jar build.jar -verbose makeapi squawk.suite.api cldc/preprocessed:imp/preprocessed:debugger/preprocessed tempdoc -verbose -docletpath build.jar
java -jar $hudsondir/findbugs/lib/findbugs.jar -textui -project $hudsondir/bin/findbugs-bootstrap.fbp -exclude $hudsondir/bin/findbugs-filter.xml -output findbugs.xml
mkdir tmp cp squawk squawk.suite squawk.suite.metadata tmp ./d.sh clean mv tmp/squawk tmp/squawk.suite tmp/squawk.suite.metadata . rmdir tmp
